articles.title: Argentina to give workers income tax relief from November
articles.description: Argentina's Economy Minister Sergio Massa said on Sunday the government will give workers tax relief from November by raising the threshold at which income tax is charged, as the country battles with soaring inflation. "It will take effect from Nov. 1, it will be above 330,000 pesos ($2,176)," Massa said in an interview with Radio Rivadavia, referring to monthly income.
articles.content:
Argentina's Economy Minister Sergio Massa said on Sunday the government will give workers tax relief from November by raising the threshold at which income tax is charged, as the country battles with soaring inflation.

articles.title: Lionel Messi says 2022 World Cup in Qatar will be his last
articles.description: The 35-year-old Argentina soccer star will play in his fifth World Cup but is still seeking his first title at the showpiece tournament.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi has confirmed that the World Cup in Qatar next month will be the last of his career.
The 35-year-old Argentina star will play in his fifth World Cup but is still seeking his first title at the showpiece tournament.

articles.title: Expresso Sports Feature on Crisis in Argentina: Country runs out of panini cards, thanks to World Cup and Messi
articles.description:
"This Expresso Sports Feature looks at the current crisis in Argentina and how the country has run out of panini cards, thanks to World Cup and Messi. Demand for the collectible cards has been fuelled by all time high hopes of a successful World Cup and Messi announcing this will be his last appearance in the showpiece event.
"

articles.title: Argentina corn planting slowest in six years due to drought, Rosario exchange says
articles.description: Argentina corn planting is progressing at its slowest pace in six years due to a protracted drought.
articles.content:
By Maximilian Heath
BUENOS AIRES, Oct 14 (Reuters) - Argentina corn planting is progressing at its slowest pace in six years due to a protracted drought, the Rosario grains exchange (BCR) said on Friday, which will drag down the amount of early-plant... [1391 chars]
